titleStmt.title: The description of a monstrous pig the which was farrowed at Hamsted besyde London, the. xvi. day of October this present yeare of our Lord God. M.D.LXII.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Alexander Lacy for Garat Devves, dwellyng in Poules church yarde, at the East end of the Church,

notesStmt.note: "UMI copy reel 1022 is actually the Bodleian Library copy."--STC.
